conceptual_ecology.name: Conceptual Ecology
conceptual_ecology.description: A structured map of domain concepts and their interrelationships
conceptual_ecology.detailed_description: Treating the field itself as a complex 'conceptual ecosystem' by constructing and analyzing a comprehensive knowledge graph of interconnected concepts, moving beyond qualitative review to quantitative, data-driven cartography.

probabilistic_knowledge_gap_engine.name: Probabilistic Knowledge-Gap Engine
probabilistic_knowledge_gap_engine.description: Identifies and ranks likely missing links in a knowledge graph
probabilistic_knowledge_gap_engine.detailed_description: A predictive engine that leverages network structure to systematically identify and rank high-potential 'knowledge gaps'â€”non-existent links between materials and applications that are strongly predicted by shared mechanistic neighbors.

causal_trajectory_synthesis.name: Causal Trajectory Synthesis
causal_trajectory_synthesis.description: Generates multi-step hypothesis paths through concept networks
causal_trajectory_synthesis.detailed_description: An algorithm that moves beyond simple link prediction to generate plausible, multi-step research programs connecting a starting concept to a target concept across a knowledge gap, transforming static predictions into actionable research hypotheses.

ct_gin_framework.name: CT-GIN Framework
ct_gin_framework.description: Category-theoretic templates coupled with graph embeddings for structured reasoning
ct_gin_framework.detailed_description: A framework combining category theory's formal structure with Graph Isomorphism Networks for robust knowledge representation and reasoning.

active_inference_agents.name: Active Inference Agents
active_inference_agents.description: Autonomous agents that minimize variational free energy to guide exploration
active_inference_agents.detailed_description: AI agents based on the free-energy principle that actively explore the knowledge space, making predictions and updating beliefs to minimize uncertainty and guide scientific discovery.

conceptual_nexus_model.name: Conceptual Nexus Model (CNM)
conceptual_nexus_model.description: A dynamic, AI-curated knowledge graph representing concepts, methods, parameters, and relations
conceptual_nexus_model.detailed_description: The core knowledge representation system that integrates concepts from multiple scientific domains into a unified, queryable, and dynamically updated graph structure.

conceptual_nexus_tensor.name: Conceptual Nexus Tensor (TCNM)
conceptual_nexus_tensor.description: A high-dimensional tensor encoding modes for nodes, relationships, context, and provenance
conceptual_nexus_tensor.detailed_description: A mathematical representation that captures the multi-dimensional relationships between concepts, including temporal evolution, contextual dependencies, and evidence provenance.

knowledge_artifact.name: Knowledge Artifact
knowledge_artifact.description: A structured, verifiable output unit extracted from publications by guided LLMs
knowledge_artifact.detailed_description: Standardized units of knowledge extracted from scientific literature using AI, containing structured information about concepts, methods, results, and relationships that can be integrated into the knowledge graph.

universal_concept_schema.name: Universal Concept Schema (UCS)
universal_concept_schema.description: The formal template schema defining node and edge types for knowledge extraction
universal_concept_schema.detailed_description: A comprehensive schema that standardizes how scientific concepts, methods, phenomena, and their relationships are represented and interconnected across disciplines.

distillation_template.name: Distillation Template
distillation_template.description: Adaptive, modular LLM prompt schema used to extract granular knowledge components
distillation_template.detailed_description: Carefully designed prompt templates that guide large language models to extract structured knowledge from scientific papers in a consistent, verifiable format.

verifiability_robustness_scoring.name: Verifiability & Robustness Scoring System
verifiability_robustness_scoring.description: Dynamic scoring framework evaluating findability, interoperability, reusability, and evidence strength
verifiability_robustness_scoring.detailed_description: A comprehensive evaluation system that assesses the quality, reliability, and utility of knowledge artifacts and connections based on FAIR principles and evidence strength.

knowledge_graph.name: Knowledge Graph
knowledge_graph.description: A graph-based representation of entities and their semantic relationships
knowledge_graph.detailed_description: A data structure that represents information as nodes (entities) and edges (relationships), enabling complex queries and reasoning about interconnected knowledge.

network_centrality.name: Network Centrality
network_centrality.description: Measures of node importance in graphs (Degree, PageRank, Betweenness)
network_centrality.detailed_description: Mathematical measures that quantify the importance or influence of nodes in a network, used to identify key concepts and influential research areas.

community_detection.name: Community Detection (Louvain)
community_detection.description: Algorithm for uncovering modular structure (clusters) in large networks
community_detection.detailed_description: Computational methods for identifying groups of densely connected nodes that represent research communities or thematic clusters within the knowledge space.

cooccurrence_network.name: Co-occurrence Network & Shannon Entropy
cooccurrence_network.description: Builds term co-occurrence networks and quantifies uncertainty via entropy
cooccurrence_network.detailed_description: Methods for analyzing how frequently concepts appear together and measuring the information content and uncertainty in these relationships.

graph_isomorphism_networks.name: Graph Isomorphism Networks
graph_isomorphism_networks.description: GNN architectures that test graph isomorphism invariance
graph_isomorphism_networks.detailed_description: Neural network architectures specifically designed for learning on graph-structured data while preserving important structural properties.

functors_limits.name: Functors, Limits/Colimits
functors_limits.description: Fundamental constructs for mapping and composing abstract structures
functors_limits.detailed_description: Mathematical tools from category theory used for formal reasoning about relationships and transformations between different knowledge domains.

free_energy_minimization.name: Free-Energy Minimization
free_energy_minimization.description: Principle guiding probabilistic inference via energy-based optimization
free_energy_minimization.detailed_description: A fundamental principle from physics and neuroscience that drives learning and adaptation by minimizing prediction errors and uncertainty.

bayesian_embedding_updates.name: Bayesian Embedding Updates
bayesian_embedding_updates.description: Incremental posterior updates of node embeddings based on new evidence
bayesian_embedding_updates.detailed_description: Statistical methods for continuously updating the numerical representations of concepts as new evidence and relationships are discovered.

reinforcement_learning.name: Reinforcement Learning (ORPO, EXO)
reinforcement_learning.description: Policy optimization methods for sequential decision-making
reinforcement_learning.detailed_description: Machine learning approaches that enable agents to learn optimal strategies for exploration and decision-making through trial and error.

niche_connectors.name: Niche Connectors
niche_connectors.description: Emerging hot topics with high interdisciplinary potential

specialized_concepts.name: Specialized Concepts
specialized_concepts.description: Essential building blocks and specialized tools
